summary: Frontend testing completed for welcome popup fix and Admin Dashboard Events/Submissions tabs. All requested features are working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Welcome popup uses sessionStorage for session-based dismissal - correctly prevents popup from reappearing after closing or navigating away/back
EventsTab in AdminPage has proper CRUD operations with Edit/Feature/Hide/Delete buttons
GallerySubmissionsTab displays user submissions with delete functionality for moderation
Events API properly seeds default events when database is empty
Good use of data-testid attributes throughout (tab-events, tab-submissions, delete-submission-*, etc.)
seed_data_creation: Default events (Friday Night Live, Brunch & Beats, Wine Down Wednesday) auto-seeded by backend when events collection is empty
context_for_next_testing_agent: All tested features are working. Welcome popup fix verified - uses sessionStorage to show popup once per browser session. Admin Panel has Events tab with full CRUD and Submissions tab for gallery moderation.

Welcome popup NOT reappear after closing.details: Popup appears on initial load, closes when X clicked, sessionStorage flag 'ff_welcome_shown_session' is set

Welcome popup NOT reappear after navigat.details: Navigated to Events page and back to homepage - popup did NOT reappear. sessionStorage persists during same browser session.

Admin Panel Events tab displays 3 events.details: Events tab shows Friday Night Live (Featured), Brunch & Beats, Wine Down Wednesday. Each has Edit, Feature/Unfeature, Hide, and Delete (trash icon) buttons.

Admin Panel Events tab Add Event button.details: Add Event button opens form with fields: Event Name, Location, Description, Date, Time, Event Image (URL/upload), Ticket Packages (General $25, VIP $75, Table $200), Mark as Featured checkbox

Admin Panel Submissions tab displays use.details: Shows 2 test submissions (TEST_Submissions, TEST_GalleryUser) with user name, caption, date, and delete button. Description: 'Photos submitted by users are auto-approved to the gallery. Remove inappropriate content here.'

Events page (/events) displays events fr.details: Events page shows all 3 events with Featured Event section for Friday Night Live. Clicking Get Tickets opens modal with package selection (General $25, VIP $75, Table $200), quantity picker, email field, and Purchase Tickets button

Admin login with admin/admin.details: Login successful with username: admin, password: admin. Dashboard loads with stats and Quick Actions
